description: If you've ever dreamt of learning how greeting cards are made and thought, "How do I start my own greeting card business?" then this is the class for you. I show you the easiest way I know how to start your company. Whether you use your own artwork or not, I'll show you how to make your art, design your card, print it, and all of the extra stuff you'll need to have in order to make it in this field. With two greeting card companies under my belt, and over 25 years experience, I'll show you how to "Jump Start" your career with some great advice. I've packed in over 25 lectures filled with personal advice on how to and how not to make it in this industry. Plus you'll even get some added bonus material on licensing! Join today and make it your business to make people smile!
title: Learn How to Start Your Own Greeting Card Business.
